text: The XG7 Trident is a Ship-Launched Fighter manufactured by Ram Tah, produced from 3304 to the present. It is featured in Elite Dangerous: Horizons and costs 15,270 CR.
The XG7 Trident has dimensions of 8.6m x 19.8m x 17.2m, with an armour rating of 10 and shields of 30 MJ. It has a top speed of 316 m/s and a boost speed of 541 m/s.

The XG7 Trident is an all-rounder fighter with a Plasma Autocannon that deals absolute damage, making it effective against both shields and hull. It is particularly effective against human ships with average resistances greater than 35%.
The XG7 Trident has 3 weapon mounts and 0 utility mounts.
